description: You can pass through Jade Screen as Ningguang or any of your party members to earn Geo damage boost, in addition to blocking enemy projectiles. To maximize your basic combo string, try to accomplish this before striking with Ningguang. Because Jade Screen's endurance scales with Ningguang's maximum health, selecting the correct Genshin Impact artifacts is critical in order to create an optimum setup.
title: Ningguang | Playstyle
